category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CM_pureaddcancel_tooltip_properties
preference.preference_description: Sets the pure add and cancel properties displayed in the genealogy watch box. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values in the form of bomedit-object.property-name. The bomedit-object string is the internal name of BOM edit object. The property-name string is a valid Teamcenter internal property name. Both internal names can be retrieved from the Business Modeler IDE.
